backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that renders the GameScreen component.
frontend/src/components/game/Hotbar.tsx: UI hotbar showing dirt/stone inventory with selectable slots and touch-aware sizing.
frontend/src/components/game/Hud.tsx: In‑game HUD displaying movement, camera, mining, placing, and collection instructions.
frontend/src/components/game/Tile.tsx: Renders an individual tile with fog‑of‑war, mining cracks, progress bar, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/game/TouchContro: Touch UI providing left/right movement buttons and a jump button for mobile players.
frontend/src/components/game/WorldGrid.t: Manages world state, player physics, camera, input (keyboard/touch), mining, and block placement; renders all tiles.
frontend/src/game/camera.ts: Computes camera scroll to center the player while clamping within world bounds.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines world size, tile size, terrain transition row, and movement physics constants.
frontend/src/game/inventory.ts: Implements simple dirt/stone inventory with helpers to increment and decrement counts.
frontend/src/game/mining.ts: Provides mining logic including visibility checks, hit reduction, block breaking, and placement rules.
frontend/src/game/miningConfig.ts: Stores mining difficulty per block type and exposes a hit‑requirement lookup.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines core types for block types, tile state, positions, and the world grid.
frontend/src/game/world.ts: Generates the world grid with dirt/stone layers and a 3×3 starter air pocket.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsTouchDevice.ts: Detects whether the user's device supports touch input.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light/dark mining‑themed color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Renders main game UI, managing inventory, block selection, and mining/placement callbacks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the game's current MVP design, including mining/placing rules, hotbar behavior, movement controls, and known issues. Also lists implemented features, architectural notes, and the project state version.
